FootballData 0.1

  • Changelog

Get upcoming matches

football_get_upcoming.Rd

Hits the matches API fixed on status=SCHEDULED.

football_get_upcoming(
  team_id = 86,
  api = "football-data.org",
  api_token = Sys.getenv("API_FOOTBALL_DATA")
)

Arguments

team_id

What is the team id
api

Which API to use.
api_token

Your API token.

Value

Base url for API

Examples

football_get_upcoming()
